headerDisplay: Homebridge/HOOBS plugin to control eWeLink devices with original firmware.
footerDisplay: For help and support please visit our [GitHub Wiki](https://github.com/bwp91/homebridge-ewelink/wiki).

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: The telephone country code linked to your eWeLink account (without the +).

username.title: Username
username.description: The phone number or email address linked to your eWeLink account. If you use a phone number please enter the country code (with the +), for example +8613185260282.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for your eWeLink account.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If checked, more information will be added to the Homebridge log.

debugReqRes.title: Request & Response Logging
debugReqRes.description: If checked, HTTP, web socket and LAN mode messages will be added to the log. Not recommended for long-term use.

disableHTTPRefresh.title: Disable Initial Device Refresh
disableHTTPRefresh.description: If checked, devices will not be refreshed with their most recent status from eWeLink when Homebridge starts. This setting can be useful for users who block their devices from accessing the internet.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If checked, the plugin will remove all eWeLink accessories from Homebridge and not load the plugin on Homebridge restart.

hideDevFromHB.title: Hide Devices
hideDevFromHB.description: A list of eWeLink devices to hide from Homebridge. For example '10009553c8' or multiple separated with a comma '10009553c8,10009553c9'.

hideChanFromHB.title: Hide Light/Switch Channels
hideChanFromHB.description: A list of light/switch channels to hide from Homebridge. For example '10009553c8SW0' or multiple separated with a comma '10009553c8SW0,10009553c9SW2'.

outletAsSwitch.title: Outlet As Switch
outletAsSwitch.description: A list of eWeLink outlet devices to show as switches in Homebridge. For example '10009553c8' or multiple separated with a comma '10009553c8,10009553c9'

inUsePowerThreshold.title: Outlet 'In Use' Threshold
inUsePowerThreshold.description: Homebridge will set the 'In Use' status of outlet devices to true when the wattage is above this number.

hideLightFromFan.title: Hide Fan Lights
hideLightFromFan.description: A list of eWeLink iFan devices for which the light will be hidden from Homebridge. For example '10009553c8' or multiple separated with a comma '10009553c8,10009553c9'

hideTHSwitch.title: Hide TH10/TH16 Switch
hideTHSwitch.description: If checked, the switch for the TH10/TH16 devices will be hidden from Homebridge.

lowBattThreshold.title: Low Battery Threshold
lowBattThreshold.description: Homebridge will set the low battery status for supported devices when the device battery reaches this percentage level.

sensorTimeDifference.title: Sensor Lag
sensorTimeDifference.description: An offset in seconds to ignore any notifications if they is a delay between a sensor detecting something and Homebridge receiving the notification. This setting applies to sensors connected to RF/Zigbee Bridges.

hideZBLDPress.title: Zigbee Button Hide Double/Long Press
hideZBLDPress.description: If checked, double and long press options will be hidden for the ZigBee button.

resetRFBridge.title: Reset RF Bridges
resetRFBridge.description: If checked, the plugin will remove and re-add all RF Bridges on Homebridge restart. This is needed when adding/removed sub-devices from the RF Bridge.

groups.title: Accessory Simulations
groups.description: You can use this setting to set up custom simulated HomeKit accessories from a generic single/multi-switch device. Please see this wiki article for more information.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Device ID from your eWeLink app (ten digits normally in the format 1000ab23cd).

type.title: Type
type.description: The new type for this device.

setup.title: Device Setup
setup.description: The setup for your garage doors.

oneOf.title: One Switch - for up and down
Two Switches - one for up and one for down

operationTime.title: Operation Time (Deciseconds)
operationTime.description: Blinds/garage doors: the time to fully open/close the device. Locks: the time to show as unlocked. Irrigation: an initial default time for HomeKit. This setting is in deciseconds - count the time in seconds and multiply by 10, for example 100 for 10 seconds or 75 for 7.5 seconds.

sensorId.title: Sensor
sensorId.description: A Sonoff DW2 sensor can optionally be used for garage doors. This is to determine the current open/closed state of the garage door. Please enter the 10 digit device ID (normally in the format 1000ab23cd). Otherwise leave this blank.

bridgeSensors.title: Sensors
bridgeSensors.description: You can expose different types of sensors connected to your RF Bridge in HomeKit. Please see this wiki article for more information.

deviceId.title: RF Bridge Device ID
deviceId.description: Device ID of your RF Bridge from your eWeLink app (10 digits normally in the format 1000ab23cd).

fullDeviceId.title: Sensor Device ID
fullDeviceId.description: Device ID of the sensor from Homebridge (13 digits normally in the format 1000ab23cdSW2).

type.title: Sensor Type
type.description: Select the type of sensor you would like to expose this as in Homebridge.

sensorTimeLength.title: Sensor Time Length
sensorTimeLength.description: The number of seconds which the sensor tile in the Home app will light up for if this sensor is activated.

nameOverride.title: Accessory Name Overrides
nameOverride.description: You can override the default name given to a device when it is added to Homebridge.

fullDeviceId.title: Device ID
fullDeviceId.description: Full device ID of the device from Homebridge (13 digits normally in the format 1000ab23cdSW2).

deviceName.title: Name
deviceName.description: The name for the accessory for when it is added to Homebridge.

ipOverride.title: IP Overrides
ipOverride.description: You can override the IP for a device in Homebridge.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Device ID from your eWeLink app (ten digits normally in the format 1000ab23cd).

deviceIP.title: IP Address
deviceIP.description: The IP address of this device which will be used by the plugin.

layout.title: Required Settings
layout.description: These are the basic settings that are required for this plugin to work.

layout.title: Optional Settings (General)
layout.description: A variety of optional settings for general use of this plugin.

layout.title: Optional Settings (Device Specific)
layout.description: A variety of optional settings for specific device types.
